CustomField.description: Number of Ports Tall x Number of Ports Wide.
CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Mod_Model__c) = "Yes", ( Number_of_Mods__c * Number_of_Ports_Wide_per_Mod__c * Number_of_Ports_Tall_per_Mod__c), ( Number_of_Ports_Wide__c * Number_of_Ports_Tall__c ))
CustomField.label: Total Number of Ports
